Thanks Tom.  This one has been around for a while (See 
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1218961&group_id=73833&atid=539099.  
Kris also reported an instance recently).  We'll try and fix it for 
1.6.0 (We're looking at doing a 1.6.0 code freeze in next day or so).

St.Ack


Tom Emerson wrote:
